entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
